topic_1.text: Have you tried using `justify-content: space-between` or `space-around`? These properties control how items are distributed along the main axis.
topic_1.author: Fatima

topic_1.text: Also check if your flex container has a defined width. If it doesn't, the items might not have space to distribute.
topic_1.author: Ahmed

topic_2.text: The `fetch` API doesn't reject the promise on HTTP error status codes like 404. You need to check the `.ok` property or `.status` code manually.
topic_2.author: Noor
